Coach Doug Collins said that he would rather not remove struggling rookie Evan Turner from the starting lineup.
Jeff Teague was held scoreless in 13 minutes of action on Monday, going 0-for-3 from the field with one rebound and one block.

Marcus Thornton logged eight minutes off the Hornets bench on Sunday.
Ronnie Price will miss Friday's game with a wrist injury suffered on Wednesday.

Earl Boykins (virus) is out for Friday's game against the Blazers.
Steve Blake hit three 3-pointers for 10 points and three assists off the bench in Tuesday's win over the Rockets.

Sasha Vujacic (concussion) will be re-evaluated on Monday.
Luke Ridnour came off the bench for 12 points, eight assists, three steals and two 3-pointers in 25 minutes in his return from a hamstring injury.
Memphis SG Elliot Williams has hired an agent and will enter the 2010 NBA draft.
Grizzlies first-round G Greivis Vasquez (ankle surgery) still hasn't practiced with the team.
The Grizzlies signed PG Mike Conley to a five-year $45 million extension on Monday.
The Blazers have a decision to make with regard to a logjam at the guard position, which in part involves Armon Johnson and Patrick Mills.
Darren Collison started on Tuesday against the Cavs, one day after returning from an ankle injury that Pacers blog
The Pacers still have interest in re-signing Earl Watson, but they'll only go so far financially, according to beat writer Mike Wells.
Will Bynum has been ruled out for Tuesday due to a hamstring injury.
Toney Douglas missed all five of his shots in 28 minutes on Saturday, finishing with two points in a loss to the Hawks.
Carlos Arroyo will start at PG for the Heat when the season begins on Tuesday.
Rudy Fernandez played just 15 minutes on Saturday, scoring four points on 1-of-6 shooting with no rebounds, three assists, and a 3-pointer.
Bobcats SG Gerald Henderson has inflammation in his left knee and it's unclear when he'll return to action.
Baron Davis came off the bench again on Friday and played just 20 minutes, finishing with eight points, six assists and five steals.
Mike Bibby scored 16 points on 6-of-10 shooting (including four 3-pointers) with one rebound and two assists in 24 minutes on Saturday.

Landry Fields had nine points, eight rebounds, a block and a 3-pointer in Friday's win over the Warriors.

Anthony Parker is expected to return to action Tuesday as long as the swelling in his fingers continues to decrease.

Willie Green does not plan to opt out of the final year of his contract.
